title: 2nd large batch of t209s available - all NEW cards being listed!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: 2nd large batch of t209s available - all NEW cards being listed!
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd go ahead and offer up the rest of my t209s for sale or trade.  The cards listed below are generally in somewhat lower condition than the first group but there are still plenty of nice ones. Most of the backs are clean and damage free as well.  I'll trade generously for anything on my wantlist and have listed prices/descriptions next to the cards below.  All prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.

Thanks much
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Stouch (Greenville) FR/GD - mild surface wear, no significant wrinkling -- $110
Gorham (Anderson) PR/FR - chipping on front, no wrinkling -- [SOLD!!]
Irvine (Richmond) PR - wrinkling/wear -- $75
Hearne (Wilson) PR/FR - wear on front -- $85

Malcolm (Goldsboro) FR/GD - chipping in one spot on border -- $110
Spratt (Roanoke) FR/GD - faint wrinkling on front -- [SOLD!!]

Martin (Greensboro) FR - couple wrinkles on front, mild staining -- [SOLD!!]
Phoenix (Raleigh) PR/FR - no wrinkling, mostly sharp corners, couple spots of damage on front -- $85
Simmons (Raleigh)PR/FR - damage on front, no wrinkling -- $85
Turner (Raleigh) PR/FR - nicks/wrinkling on front -- $85

Brian,

I just sent you an email with five cards I am interested in (Gorham, Lathrop, Spratt, Farmer, and Bonner).

Thanks!

Zach Rice

Brian-
Thanks for the scan.  I will take Martin.  E-mail on the way.

DMcD

Thanks everyone.  This second group of t209s has seen quite a few cards sold from it as well.  At this point, I believe I've responded to everyone but let me know if I missed anybody...

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
